consolidationOpportunities.name: Ethics Lens Application (G6)
consolidationOpportunities.proposed: T32.G6.04: Apply ethics lenses (beneficence, fairness, autonomy) to evaluate projects
consolidationOpportunities.rationale: Teaching three lenses separately is pedagogically sound, but each could be a sub-skill of one assessment skill

consolidationOpportunities.name: Career Cluster Identification (G6)
consolidationOpportunities.proposed: T32.G6.14: Identify and compare computing career clusters (software, hardware, data, AI/ML)
consolidationOpportunities.rationale: These are identical in structure, just different domains. Could be one skill with 4 examples.

consolidationOpportunities.name: AI Displacement Analysis (G8)
consolidationOpportunities.proposed: T32.G8.17: Analyze AI impacts on jobs (displacement vs augmentation patterns)
consolidationOpportunities.rationale: These form one coherent analysis - identifying both displacement and augmentation should happen together

consolidationOpportunities.name: Workshop Design & Delivery (G7-G8)
consolidationOpportunities.proposed: G7: Plan and deliver lesson to younger coders; G8: Design and deliver interactive workshop on responsible tech
consolidationOpportunities.rationale: G7.24-25 already form a plan-deliver pair. G8.04.01-03 duplicate this pattern with more complexity.

consolidationOpportunities.name: Build Testing Tools (G6-G7)
consolidationOpportunities.proposed: Keep G6.03 (dashboard) and G7.01 (systematic framework), but G6.01-02 could be sub-components
consolidationOpportunities.rationale: Too granular - testing image AI and chat AI separately, then combining, is excessive

consolidationOpportunities.name: Team Meeting Skills (G6-G7)
consolidationOpportunities.proposed: G5: Lead team check-ins; G6: Conduct agile ceremonies (stand-ups, sprint reviews); G8: Facilitate retrospectives
consolidationOpportunities.rationale: Teaching specific agile ceremonies is great, but could be consolidated into agile collaboration skills
